name: Santa's Advantures
description:
Santa must dodge from snowballs, collect gifts, witch he can spend to buy skins.

Now there are 6 skins, multi-colored Santas, snowman, and Grinch.
In coming updates skins will have unique skills!

If you found a bug tell us about that, gamedevnocreative@gmail.com

Thanks for playing and good luck ^_^
